features: One Panel: Package includes one panel of 52" wide x 108" long luxury velvet curtain panel. It is formaldehyde-free and environment friendly, no chemical coating, no toxic smell, safe and green.

Room Darkening Curtain: With this luxury room darkening velvet panel you get 0 TV glare for your favorite game and enough privacy with all your indoor activity. You get 50% sunlight out for bedtime, no morning light sneaking through to wake you up, you can enjoy your sleep time.

Elegant Look: The velvet curtain is soft to the touch and elegant like suede. They drape nicely and good looking. When the curtain hang on the rod make your room became beautiful luxury like a royal castle.
Hanging Option: The hanging method is rod pocket, suitable for rod that smaller than 1.9 inches. Perfect for your living room, bedroom, home theater, nursery and so on.
Easy Care: Machine washable in cold water, tumble dry. Quick ironing or steam clean as needed.

The description says the curtain is blackout, does the curtain have back liner? This curtain has no lining. Because the panel fabric is thick enough, when you close them, which can help you block out some of the light. Darker color works better. Are the colors correct in the image? We have images and videos to show the colors. They are almost similar with the actual, but due to different display devices or lighting environment, they may be appear a slight color gap between image and real product. My windows are exactly 96 inches from the floor, can I just buy the 96 inches curtains? Our curtain panel length is from curtain top to bottom. Due to the hanging rod, the length will be shortened about 1-2" each panel when you hang it. You can order longer curtains to decor windows. How to get wrinkles out. Hand wash, iron, steam? Machine washable in cold water, tumble dry. Use a steamer iron on the back and front of the curtain at low temperature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are expensive looking and great quality!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was hesitant when I got these.. but after putting them up I am in LOVE. They add so much warmth to our room and they look extremely elegant and expensive! They are heavy and definitely are black out. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am VERY Impressed!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Emerald Green curtains in 96 inches, They are gorgeous! True to color, soft and hangs very well. The only thing I was disappointed with was realizing they were only sold with ONE panel, but that's my fault for not paying attention, I ordered 3 more and received them today. I'm in LOVE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, great quality
reviews.reviewText: I love these curtains, I have them in different colors in different rooms. They are thick and soft and gorgeous colors. 11/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are perfect! The texture looks very high end, but for a great price! Was afraid they might have too much of a velvety appearance- not at all. Texture is like a muted softness. Not completely black out- but I suffer from chronic migraines and these (w apartment blinds) make my room very dark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value for the Price
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the velvet is good, the color is lovely and the price is right. There are some sewing defects along the seams here & there and because of that ~ pressing them flat is a problem due to extra material puffing in the seams.That being said ~ once you hang them up ~ you’re hard-pressed to notice any defects unless you inspect them closely. They block light well.All in all ~ quite happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Run to buy these. I said RUN!
reviews.reviewText: Umm ok... I had no idea that the bright glow from my paper thin curtains at night was keeping me awake so much... Until I started having crazy insomnia and I was desperate for something that would help (besides hard meds obviously). Long story slightly less long, I bought these bad boys and suddenly my nighttime room is dark as the bowels of Khazad Dum. I had NO idea sleep could be this way. I can't even see my hand in front of my face. With my previous garbage curtains, I could make out every detail of my room and walk around with no additional light. Now, if I have to tinkle in the middle of the night or am at the beck and call of my monstrous overlord of a cat, I'm stumbling around like a mime trapped in a box. And they are lovely so that's a bonus! First picture is 8am, well after sunrise, and as you can see it's still dark as heck. Second pic is with lights on just to show how pretty the curtains are. Lovely thick velvet. Will definitely purchase more for other rooms in the house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order these. You won't regret it. Looks & feels more expensive than they actually are.
reviews.reviewText: Looking at the photos, it's obvious these drapes still need to be hemmed. I can do the pool but the puddle is too much for me.I ordered 6 panels and they were delivered the next day. I've spent the past 6 months since moving into the new house trying out different curtains and drapes. I initially hung sheer grommet curtains on single rods but wanted something thicker to help keep out the heat during one of the hottest SoCal summer ever. These velvet drapes are the 5th set I've hung. The 4th are the white cotton ones that I moved to the inner rods. I'm still debating if I want to keep them up. Let's not talk about the 3rd set of counterfeit curtains. I also changed the height of the rods, requiring longer drapes, and changed to double brackets to add a 2nd rod (the single brackets still need to be removed from the walls) to hang up sheer/light filtering curtains.I was really happy when I opened the first package of drapes and temporarily hung them up with clips to see how they draped. My biggest problem with the previous sets were how they draped. I ironed, steamed, trained, weighted, waited, and begged and was still not happy. The fabric of these drapes are nice and thick but not too heavy. I'm very impressed with the construction and stitching. The color is exactly what I expected although I was on the fence about ordering these greyish blue ones or a different brand in a deep aqua color.The drapes are not perfect but I have no complaints for the price. My drapes wish list items include:1) Additional hanging options other than rod pockets. Back tab or a header/pleating tape would have been nice. I did consider adding pleating tape but I wasn't sure I wanted the formal look of pleats. I wanted to hang these with curtain rings so they're easier to open/close but I didn't like the look of the clips on the fabric. I ended up ordering metal drapery hooks from Amazon and hung the hooks on curtain rings. I started placing the hooks 4 inches apart (for a total of 14 per panel) based on recommendations by drapery pros but I didn't like the look. I changed the spacing and used a total of 9 per panel. I think I would have used back tabs if these panels came with them.2) Weighted hems would have been nice. They're included with many higher end drapes. But it's not a deal breaker since they drape fine without the weights.3) Length - I would be a happy camper if manufacturers made 87" or 88" as the standard length and got rid of the 84". 84" is too short and 95" is too long and I don't want to lose the beautiful hems by getting them hemmed. This probably would not be an issue for me if I knew how to operate a sewing machine.4) Wider than 54" panels. 54" is actually wider than other panels I've seen and double panels cost more than 2x the amount for 2 panels. I need about 1.5 panels for perfect fullness. 2 panels on each side is a little too full. Maybe I'll order additional panels and figure out how to add half a panel to each panel.All in all, I have no complaints about these drapes. I would have had to spend much more on custom drapes made to my exact specifications. These will stay up and I will move on to my next project. I may revisit deep aqua velvet drapes or gold rods in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Make sure you read the description right, unlike me. The material is perfect and the colour hue is exactly what I wanted. The only thing (due to no fault of the company) the curtain is made for rod curtains. I wanted these on a tracking system. So I had to sewed in pleated tape.
They look just like descriptionReally impressed with the quality they look really elegant and expensive !!!
Solo me llegó 1 hoja. En el titulo dice 2. La calidad es buena, pero más de 700 pesos por 1 sola hoja es muy caro.
These amazing curtains are the perfect touch for my living room. They are soft yet heavy, keep the light and heat out in summer and gorgeous to look at! Definitely buying another set
I'm amazed by how quality and beautiful these are!
